definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Da 5:6 joint, knot;—lit. pl. cstr. [[קִטְרֵי]] Da 5:6 joints of his loin; fig. abs. [[קִטְרִין]] v:Da 5:12, v:Da 5:16, usu. knotty things, difficulties (Syr. PS:3591); but prob. of magic spells, banns (also Syr. PS:1. c., cf. Brock:319 b), so Bev, v. also Dr.
